casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Respondent, v. Louis GOLDSTEIN, Appellant. No. 429. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 24, 1931. David Haar, of New York City, for appellant. George Z. Medalie, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Seymour D. Altmark, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment of conviction affirmed.
